sentence.Network_en: It would be a disaster for them not to reach the semi-finals.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果不能挺进半决赛，对他们来说就是完败。

sentence.Network_en: "Third World" is an abstraction, a form of shorthand.
sentence.Network_cn: “第三世界”是个抽象概念，是一种简称。

sentence.Network_en: He was beaten in the semi-finals by Chris Dittmar.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在半决赛中输给了克里斯·迪特马尔。

list.abs: Painting (In Series) ... Landscape Series 风景系列 Semi-Abstract 半抽象系列 Early Water Colour 早期水彩.

auth_sentence.content: They ranged from a semi-automatic rifle to hand guns.
auth_sentence.res_content: They ranged from a semi-automatic rifle to hand guns.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They ranged from a semi-automatic rifle to hand guns.

auth_sentence.content: Note that space is semi-detached from touch in dreams.
auth_sentence.res_content: Note that space is semi-detached from touch in dreams.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Note that space is semi-detached from touch in dreams.

auth_sentence.content: The semi-religious ones appear to be a red herring.
auth_sentence.res_content: The semi-religious ones appear to be a red herring.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The semi-religious ones appear to be a red herring.
